site_name: Brent Cross Cricklewood Regeneration Area,North West London
description: Application pursuant to Section 96A of the Town and Country Planning Act for non-material amendments to Condition 1 (Approved Plans) attached to the Reserved Matters Approval 17/6662/RMA for Plot 12 dated 28/02/2018 (as amended by 20/0362/NMA dated 07/02/2020, 20/1174/NMA dated 04/09/2020, 20/5694/NMA dated 01/04/2021, 21/5981/NMA dated 12/08/2022, 23/2212/NMA dated 04/08/2023, 23/5028/NMA dated 19/01/2024, 24/2783/NMA dated 23/09/2024, and 25/0451/NMA Dated 20/03/2025) within Phase 1B (South) of Section 73 planning permission F/04687/13 dated 23 July 2014 for the comprehensive mixed use redevelopment of the Brent Cross Cricklewood Regeneration Scheme. The proposed amendments include changes to condition 1 (Approved Plans) comprising changes to the layout of Car parking within the basement of Plot 12 to accommodate a number of car parking spaces for residents of Plot 11 and changes to the Tertiary Street to the east of Plot 12 to include two new drop off bays associated with the nursery in Plot 11 and adjustments to the footpath and pedestrian crossing to reflect amendments to the car parking entrance in Plot 11.
